data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Mqrp91thJmkQ7kNvgE7MXS1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBuOyZZcfddUHG-orvwp87BK_7gdmGjJfl_gt4QMkCinw&oe=66E9689C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XYOWceFDjGwQ7kNvgFFV7Qm&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAfq2Z3RMyJuMlxXP6zZVdrkXNslK9HyfOLZgYoDRQxKQ&oe=66E97224)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bIvbpzRVN8oQ7kNvgHdAID5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAgeT2LpJfI3ZWEHxaz8k3qNue_6GQ7V59gKARItOuGVg&oe=66E95987)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PGFu1WW6-7kQ7kNvgEhpJHD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAynuAjNI2FLL84Eyg3lfzHyWwMXOzXsWhX80ht0hqQ2Q&oe=66E94C66)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2iQRby9esQIQ7kNvgEi90dB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCVqn1UR5oxOwnixgOTw13ozHlnk7hgZns-I78awGxEMQ&oe=66E978D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gvvkfiW3T8EQ7kNvgFk7O-L&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCd2ZvVjmfTACLvJUYF7ahqE1R4KFNTmJ9Fe6I1yx79GQ&oe=66E97559)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=C7DiPHDlX3IQ7kNvgFsGxC8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDpJO6kuz1LKvoi5MMasU7fwDoE9c2ngg8Uvc8e9oeA5w&oe=66E95B70)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Q8_ka5aCZTQQ7kNvgH107O6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA3PkAZ45JKl86odqKBMEEbM9UEOHjr37_QRkjWj7HoGg&oe=66E945EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9m_Qac_e02cQ7kNvgEhHCWT&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB4PSYc2dvqDTWLj4hbX1pBgBPtl7RuJV-8Pp8_rMQuyA&oe=66E95997)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=B_jEY168MwoQ7kNvgHh0hVy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYArw2oEWnyCEOiAJjHohCqqaks5tbB-K1ngxv5hObcniw&oe=66E9750C)
